#summary hamakefile syntax

= Introduction =

This page describe syntax of XML files understood by 'hamake'. 

= Informal description ==

The file is an XML document. 
Root element is:
Name: 'project'
Attributes:
  * 'default' - name of default target (optional)
  * 'name' - project name (optional)
